Comfort and Tenderness--Even in His childhood He spoke words of comfort and tenderness to young and old. . . . He was an example of what all 
                                                                           81
children may strive to be. . . . In His words and actions He manifested tender sympathy for all. His companionship was a healing, soothing balm to the disheartened and depressed.--SD 151.
